news.title: First Two Alan Vega Solo Albums to Be Reissued by Sacred Bones
news.summary: 1980’s Alan Vega and 1981’s Collision Drive arrive on digital streaming platforms for the first time on January 23

news.title: Spotify Acquires WhoSampled, Announces Expanded Song Credits
news.summary: The sample-sourcing website will continue to operate “as a standalone platform and brand,” according to a statement
